meta.description: Labels for BlockElements plugin of htmlArea RTE

languageKey.label: Increase indent
Increases text indentation
Reduce indent
Reduces text indentation
Large quotation
Makes a large quotation block
Type of block
Insert a paragraph before the current block
Insert paragraph before
Inserts a paragraph before the current block
Insert a paragraph after the current block
Insert paragraph after
Inserts a paragraph after the current block
Justify left
Aligns the text to the left
Center
Centers the text
Justify right
Aligns the text to the right
Justify left and right
Aligns the text both to the left and the right
Left
Ordered List
Makes an ordered list from the curent selection
Bulleted List
Makes a bulleted list from the current selection
Horizontal Rule
Inserts an horizontal rule
No block format
Remove block format
